prompts: Create a deer-like Pokemon with antlers made of colorful leaves and a friendly demeanor.
I want a nature-themed Pokemon that can change its appearance with the seasons.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the beauty of autumn with vibrant foliage and earthy tones.
Make a four-legged creature that thrives in forest environments and has a gentle personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that represents the cycle of life through its seasonal transformations.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a majestic stag with a powerful yet calm presence.
Show me a Pokemon that can blend into its grassy surroundings and has a playful spirit.
